      • isNumbersEqual

        public int isNumbersEqual(int userNumber)
        Checks for user and secret number equality
        Parameters:
        userNumber - number, which user have inputted
        Returns:
        0 if numbers are equal, 1 if user's number more than secret number, -1 if user's number less than secret number

      • getRandomNumber

        public int getRandomNumber()
        Generates random number in specified range
        Returns:
        random number in range between minBarrier and maxBarrier
